attributes.action: Make childhood vaccination programs mandatory in order for to start school
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly to avoid a repeat of the tragic consequences seen through the covid-19 pandemic every person should be vaccinated.
Through the enormous amount of false information spread across various social media platforms there are a vast number of people and parents who refuse to vaccinate their children. While this exists, so will the risk of these people including children to spread communicable disease such as mumps, measles etc which we have seen reoccur within people not vaccinted with fatalities
attributes.background:
Make vaccinations for children in the UK mandatory in order to start school including when it becomes available for covid-19.
Better national recording of administered vaccinations of every person's including: vaccines, dates, times in order to easily identify and contact those who need boosters.
